page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content:
Hawick's traditional industry is luxury knitwear and, over the years, firms such as Pringle of Scotland, Lyle and Scott, and others, have created a worldwide reputation for their quality garments.
In terms of new industry, Hawick has established a diverse range of small and medium companies which are producing such varied products as road-sweeping vehicles, timber-framed houses and aluminium doors and windows.
Many old buildings have been tastefully renovated to house new industry and, in addition, modern factories have been built on the outskirts of the town. Lastly, Hawick area can offer skilled personnel eager to adopt new technology.
